Khurshid Anwar (born 2 December 1987) is a Pakistani cricketer. In October 2010, he was named in the Abbottabad Falcons' squad for the 2010â€“11 National T20 Cup. He made his Twenty20 debut for the Abbottabad Falcons on 13 October 2010, against the Peshawar Panthers.
